column4: OK, what's the best approach for documenting the lousy quality of my ISP uplink, say over a 24-hour period? I'm thinking of saving the ping replies to a file and then creating a graphical output from that. Any easy way of doing this?
I was thinking there is probably an app made by someone already which will do this...
investigate a package called smokeping. Gives you output like http://oss.oetiker.ch/smokeping-demo/?target=Customers.OP
